SELECT staff.s_id, staff.s_name, staff.s_sore, staff.s_phone, staff.s_date, staff.u_id, staff.ks_id, staff.t_id, staff.s_zt, frequency.F_id, frequency.F_start_time, frequency.F_end_time, frequency.fc_id, department_ks.ks_name, department_ks.ks_dz, department_ks.de_id, title.T_name, scheduling.Sc_id, scheduling.rq
FROM staff INNER JOIN title ON staff.t_id = title.T_id INNER JOIN department_ks ON staff.ks_id = department_ks.ks_id INNER JOIN scheduling ON staff.s_id = scheduling.S_id INNER JOIN frequency ON frequency.F_id = scheduling.fr_id where DATE_FORMAT(NOW(),'%Y-%m-%d') = DATE_FORMAT(scheduling.rq,'%Y-%m-%d') and time(frequency.F_start_time) < time(NOW()) and time(frequency.F_end_time) > TIME(NOW())
select * from scheduling pb inner join staff yg on pb.s_id=yg.s_id inner join register r on r.t_id=yg.t_id WHERE TO_DAYS(NOW())-TO_DAYS(rq) > -7 and TO_DAYS(rq) >= TO_DAYS(NOW())
